title: Borgnjor's Mausoleum
data:
{{version029}}{{stub}} '''Borgnjor's Mausoleum''' is a [[wizlab]]. ==Summary== "Split map layout with corporeal undead on one side and incorporeal undead on the other. [[Lost soul]]s spawn continuously, and the ending includes some [[halazid warlock]]s and their servants. Loot is necromancy themed, as you'd expect" ==Map== [[File:Borgnjor minimap 29.png]]
